txt_content:
Dear notch:
Hello.
I play MC a few days ago, suddenly reminded of a natural terrain: swamp. I would like to, if the MC out of a "mud" box, then MC does not have a attract game player advantage?
This is the character I think: Block - mud
Trait -- any creature in the above step (including Notch) will be in the ratio into spider web falling speed +4 sink, not too far to 1 frames per second speed of blood lose. PS: mud like water, will spread, but only around 3 meters (2 to 1 meters)
Appearance: such as podzolic soil, but with water, a little shorter than normal soil.
My idea is this, hope you have a good idea of how to reply to me, thank you.
